text: S. L. Puram Sadanandan (1928–2005) was a playwright and film scriptwriter from Kerala, India. ==Life== He has written more than 60 plays. His first drama, Kudiyirakku, was staged when he was only 16 years old. He entered the filmworld by writing the dialogues for the film Sreekovil in 1962. He had written script for famous Malayalam film of the 1960s, Chemmeen. He wrote scripts for more than 135 films and many of them won state and national awards. In 1967 he got the first ever National Film Award for Best Screenplay for the film Agniputhri. ==Death== He died on 16 September 2005. He was survived by his wife Omana Sadanandan and two sons, Jayasurya (who directed the films Speed Track and Angel John) and Jayasoma.Mohammed Ashraf (19 September 2005).
